transformed_texts:
The Catholic Church needs to change some things.
The Church has strong views on certain topics.
People are leaving the Church because of this.
The Church is against gay marriage and abortion.
They should accept these things more.
Many people disagree with the Church's views.
People want the Church to change.

I like. I think it's okay for gay people to marry. I don't think it's a choice. It's like being born straight. Some people are born gay. It's not something they choose. So, it's wrong to say men and women can marry, but not gay people. It's not a legal or moral issue. It's just about how people are born. The government should not interfere. It's not their business. It's not a security issue. It's about people being who they are.

I think gay marriage should be legal.
There is no good reason to stop it.
Many think gay couples hurt the regular family.
But this is different.
There are many parts to it.
It is like two sides of the same coin.
One side is not the other.
But they ask for one thing: a marriage certificate.
This is a legal document from the government.
Not because of church.
It is like segregation.
It is not fair.
They are the same in many ways.
People worry about children of gay couples.
But they can be happy.
Parents are the same.
They can be in the community.
I think the government should make gay marriage legal in every state.
I think President Bush has strong views.
He thinks it is against his religion.
But this is not a good reason.
The government should not make laws based on religion.
Many think gay people are sick.
This is not true.
Psychologists say this is not true.
People should listen to them, not just friends.

I work in a hospital pharmacy during the summer.
Some drugs are illegal but can help people.
I think we should not give these drugs to the public.
But, we should use them for medicine.
People should not think they are bad just because they are illegal.
Many drugs are illegal but safe, like oxycod, Vicodin, and Percocets.
We should not judge marijuana like these drugs.
Marijuana can help people, but it's hard to use responsibly.
We should slowly make it legal.
First, we must change the bad image of marijuana.
Then, people can use it fairly.

I think the church has changed for the twenty-first century.
It is not as strict.
I went to private school and wore cute dresses.
Now, they have a shorter mass.
People dress more casually.
I don’t know politics. That is the biggest change.
[Regarding accusations against Catholic priests, I do not think this could be prevented by allowing female priests or married priests. I think pedophilia is genetic. I think church rules could not stop this. If they knew and covered it up, they are wrong. I think people with these issues are born this way. I don’t have other thoughts about the church.]

I first thought the idea was okay. But many people were still upset about 9/11. We went to war in Iraq under false reasons. The Bush administration said Iraq had weapons of mass destruction and linked the war to Osama Bin Laden. This was not true. This made me very angry. I think they lied to the American people. Colin Powell also said he was not convinced by the evidence he presented. This is bad leadership. The Bush administration did not follow the constitution. They wanted to go to war. The Secretary of the Treasury said this in his book. The younger Bush wanted revenge for his dad's policies. He also wanted more oil. But, the war is too long. If we stop now, there could be a civil war. The UN wants a group of nations to help. But, this could cause more problems. Iraq's government is weak. The Parliament is not effective. Many groups want control. It is unclear who will lead Iraq.

I spoke about the War in Iraq.
Yes, I talked.
I said: It does not feel right.
It's not a real war because no one declared it.
I feel it was just a way to get back at Iraq.
They did not declare it.
No one should stay there to build democracy.
It will take too long.
It makes everyone upset.
If we leave, they will be angry.
We should not waste resources.
We should not look bad as a president.
It's like the Vietnam War.
It's a bad thing.
I feel bad for Bush.
I do not know the end of the story.
I think we should keep going.
I don't know if it's good or bad.
I feel bad for families there.
I feel bad for the kids.
Their lives are not safe.
They have different beliefs.
We should not change their culture.
It will make Al-Qaida stronger.
It will make the U.S. look bad.
It will last for years.
That's all.

I do not think it is right for a state to make it legal.
The Constitution says church and state must be separate.
I think churches should decide.
It is not the government's place to decide what is or is not legal.
Most religions do not support it.
The separation of church and state is important.
Making an amendment to change this would be wrong.
It would restrict people, not the government.
I do not believe the government should be involved.
I do not see why the president wants this amendment.
It is just his personal belief.
It is up to the churches to decide.
It will not affect the economy.
It might even be good for society.

The war in Iraq was not right.
The U.S. government was not honest about the reasons for war. They said Iraq was linked to the 9/11 attacks, but it was not true. They wanted to make people believe Iraq was the cause. The war started in 2003.
I do not like war. I think it is not good. I did not want the U.S. to make a preemptive strike. That means to attack before being attacked.
The Iraq war is like the Vietnam War. The U.S. should have learned from past mistakes. Many soldiers died.
The U.S. did not plan well for what happened after removing the Iraqi government. There was chaos and violence. Many soldiers are still dying.
The U.S. is trying to put a democratic government in Iraq, but it is not easy. It takes time and the U.S. should have planned for this.
The U.S. promised a quick victory, but the war is long. It is hard to stop insurgents. They are not normal soldiers, but ordinary people.
The U.S. should not have started the war. If they did, they should have planned for all possible outcomes. They were not ready.
Many soldiers died, and many are still dying. The U.S. is still training Iraqi troops. It is a long process.
The U.S. should not have made people believe the war would be easy. It is not like in the U.S. where democracy was a long struggle.
The 2004 election was hard. I thought George Bush should finish what he started. But I also thought about the many soldiers dying.
The war is complex. It is hard to leave Iraq. We took away their government. But we should also consider the number of U.S. soldiers killed.
The war is about oil. The U.S. wants to control oil resources.
The U.S. said Iraq had weapons of mass destruction, but none were found. Other countries with weapons are not attacked. The U.S. is not being honest.
I hope the war ends soon, but it probably will not.

I like gay marriage.
I always have.
I think it is a personal choice.
It is not about biology or society.
I believe it is unfair to take away rights.
I am for equal rights.

I think government should not decide.
It is a personal choice.
It is not about politics or law.
I know many happy gay families.
They are like any other family.

People should not stop gay people from marrying.
It is not fair.
Marriage should be private.

Putting things on internet is public. Everyone can see. You cannot hide. As Resident Advisor, I saw this. People judge you. If you say bad things, people worry. School has to act. They cannot ignore. Someone might do bad things. You cannot stop them. Some people joke. They say things to scare. School must check. Privacy is not important. If you do not want seen, do not post. School looks at posts if people bring it. If danger, school acts. They check internet. They talk to people. They do not spy. If school gets message, they act. You cannot stop people from thinking. School cannot control what people say. Teachers should not friend students. They should not look at posts. It is not good. They should not look at private things. School has rules. They act if there is danger. Residents should not be friends with me. I do not want to see private things. It is not my job.

I think the war has lasted too long.
The start was good. We wanted to give democracy to Iraq.
But now, I think we have lost that goal.
We might be doing it just to show we are a strong country.
Maybe President Bush’s father’s old problems with Saddam Hussein were reasons too.
I think giving democracy was a good reason but now it might not be.
The war was short at the start. But now it has gone on for years.
I think it should stop.
The Iraq government should manage on its own now.
We should not spend so much money on this war.
We have our own problems here, like poverty and schools.
We need to use money for our own people, not for a long war.

I have a question. A person saw an online profile and stopped a bad thing from happening. Is that okay? Some people say it is not fair. Is it wrong for someone to look at profiles? I think it depends on why they are looking. If they are looking for information to stop a bad thing, that is okay. But if they are just looking for fun, that is not good. I have a Facebook. I know people can see my information. That is scary. I have seen a man do this on TV. He got a girl's name and talked to her on chat. I would not do that. But some people in my class do this. They know me by my screen name. They can see my schedule and where I am. I try to keep my information safe. But I use Facebook to talk to friends. So it is hard. I only let people I know look at my profile. I do not know if this is private or not. I heard my roommate's high school banned students from having Myspace. I think this is unfair. The school should not tell students what they can and can't do.

I talk about Iraq War.
I feel bad.
I don't like to say this.
I was against it from start.
It's not important now.
Many think it was bad idea.
Nearly everyone thinks so.
Poll say eighty percent.
Seventy-five percent of world.
Iraqis think us leave.
Troops say us leave in year.
War is disaster.
Pulling out is also disaster.
Middle East hard to understand.
Culture different.
Democracy not work there.
Iraq was bad.
But, should consider pros and cons.
We go into quicksand.
I don't know what to say.
I don't see reason to stay.
I don't agree with administration.
No good reason to stay.
I see people leave in year.
People we help want us to leave.
We should ask them.
If they say yes, not our fault.
If bad happens, we ask them.
We can help later.
We'll be good guys.
We never good guys in Middle East.
But better than now.

I agree. Gender discrimination still exists in the United States.

For women, it's hard to reach the top. Many people don't want to work under a woman. This is because society has long thought that women are not good for high positions.

Men also face issues. In fashion, people think that men don't know about fashion for women.

We can't change this quickly. It takes time. We're making progress. More women are becoming CEOs. More men are staying at home as fathers.

Society is learning to accept these changes. We should promote good qualities of people. If we push too hard, people will resist. We need to change slowly.

Class and where you grew up also matter. People might judge you if you don't speak well. They might not trust you.

Yes, it's more discrimination against those not born in cities or with good education.

They did not legalize it. They decriminalized it. This means it is not a criminal offense. It's like a traffic ticket. If you get caught, you just get cited. It is not like a drug charge. Decriminalization does not stop future problems. It can cost a lot to arrest and lock up people. It costs a lot for trials and lawyers. This can be a problem for towns with money problems. Some towns do not want to decriminalize. In Denver, it is okay. They save money and can help more people. Marijuana should not be everywhere. It is not like cigarettes. It can be taboo. People react differently to substances. Some people can handle more than others. Both alcohol and marijuana have bad effects.

I say yes.
Many things in the Catholic Church are old.
It is good to keep traditions.
But we must also be able to change.
Many Catholics must go to Church every week.
They are strict about how things are done.
Sometimes, they make others feel bad if they do not follow all rules.
They do not accept people who are not perfect Catholics or other religions.
My parents were not both Catholic.
My dad was Episcopalian.
My mom was Catholic.
They would not marry them in the Catholic Church.
This is not kind to others.
The Church teaches to love others, but does not accept them if they are not perfect.
This is not fair.
The Church's rules are old and not kind.
People who hurt children will do it no matter if married or not.
I do not think allowing priests to marry would stop this.

I don't know yet about marriage.
It is very difficult.
Church and state should not mix.
Marriage is hard to define without hurting feelings.
I think same-sex marriage should be like civil unions.
It's about two people together.
Government should not care about religion.
It should just look at it as a civil union.
States should agree and make it a law.
But, a constitutional amendment to ban it is silly.
It's not a big enough issue.
It's not important enough to change the constitution.

I grew up in a Christian family. I am confused about homosexuality. I have many gay friends. I do not agree with their lifestyle, but I think it should be legal. I do not think it should be a national issue. I think each state should decide. Some states are democratic and some are republican. Democratic states will be for gay marriage. If you live in a democratic state, you know how it feels about the issue. You chose to live there. I think homosexuals should have the same opportunities as heterosexuals. Therefore, I think it should be legal based on each state's decision. I do not think the president should decide for the whole country. I do not agree with Bush's ban on it. He does not live in every state, so he should not make decisions for each state. I think some things should be left to each state. It is their decision, not the president's. I do not think it should go back and forth. Each state should make their own decision. They will live with it, not the president.

I don’t agree.
Myspace is public.
You post. Others see.
School officials can see too.
They help keep school safe.
They check for bad things.
This is good.
I don’t think they should look just to catch students.
But, if they help make school safer, yes.
When parents drop kids off, they expect safety.
Schools have drills for safety.
School officials were just making school safer.
They prevent bad things like school shootings.
I agree with that.

At first, I thought we should go to war. I felt angry about 9/11. I wanted to bring big damage to them. But now, I think this was a mistake. We rushed into war without a good plan. We did not think about the long-term effects. We just went there to get revenge. President Bush thought the people wanted to go to war. He decided to declare war on Iraq. But we should have had a better plan. We did not know what to do. We did not have unity. We should have made a better plan before going to war. I think we cannot change them. They will always fight each other. We cannot stay there forever. We should leave. We are not helping by staying there.

The war in Iraq was not right.
The U.S. government was not honest about the reasons for war. They said Iraq was linked to the 9/11 attacks, but it was not true. They wanted to make people believe Iraq was the cause. The war started in 2003.
I do not like war. I think it is not good. I did not want the U.S. to make a preemptive strike. That means to attack before being attacked.
The Iraq war is like the Vietnam War. The U.S. should have learned from past mistakes. Many soldiers died.
The U.S. did not plan well for what happened after removing the Iraqi government. There was chaos and violence. Many soldiers are still dying.
The U.S. is trying to put a democratic government in Iraq, but it is not easy. It takes time and the U.S. should have planned for this.
The U.S. promised a quick victory, but the war is long. It is hard to stop insurgents. They are not normal soldiers, but ordinary people.
The U.S. should not have started the war. If they did, they should have planned for all possible outcomes. They were not ready.
Many soldiers died, and many are still dying. The U.S. is still training Iraqi troops. It is a long process.
The U.S. should not have made people believe the war would be easy. It is not like in the U.S. where democracy was a long struggle.
The 2004 election was hard. I thought George Bush should finish what he started. But I also thought about the many soldiers dying.
The war is complex. It is hard to leave Iraq. We took away their government. But we should also consider the number of U.S. soldiers killed.
The war is about oil. The U.S. wants to control oil resources.
The U.S. said Iraq had weapons of mass destruction, but none were found. Other countries with weapons are not attacked. The U.S. is not being honest.
I hope the war ends soon, but it probably will not.

I like gay marriage.
I always have.
I think it is a personal choice.
It is not about biology or society.
I believe it is unfair to take away rights.
I am for equal rights.

I think government should not decide.
It is a personal choice.
It is not about politics or law.
I know many happy gay families.
They are like any other family.

People should not stop gay people from marrying.
It is not fair.
Marriage should be private.

Putting things on internet is public. Everyone can see. You cannot hide. As Resident Advisor, I saw this. People judge you. If you say bad things, people worry. School has to act. They cannot ignore. Someone might do bad things. You cannot stop them. Some people joke. They say things to scare. School must check. Privacy is not important. If you do not want seen, do not post. School looks at posts if people bring it. If danger, school acts. They check internet. They talk to people. They do not spy. If school gets message, they act. You cannot stop people from thinking. School cannot control what people say. Teachers should not friend students. They should not look at posts. It is not good. They should not look at private things. School has rules. They act if there is danger. Residents should not be friends with me. I do not want to see private things. It is not my job.

I think the war has lasted too long.
The start was good. We wanted to give democracy to Iraq.
But now, I think we have lost that goal.
We might be doing it just to show we are a strong country.
Maybe President Bush’s father’s old problems with Saddam Hussein were reasons too.
I think giving democracy was a good reason but now it might not be.
The war was short at the start. But now it has gone on for years.
I think it should stop.
The Iraq government should manage on its own now.
We should not spend so much money on this war.
We have our own problems here, like poverty and schools.
We need to use money for our own people, not for a long war.

I have a question. A person saw an online profile and stopped a bad thing from happening. Is that okay? Some people say it is not fair. Is it wrong for someone to look at profiles? I think it depends on why they are looking. If they are looking for information to stop a bad thing, that is okay. But if they are just looking for fun, that is not good. I have a Facebook. I know people can see my information. That is scary. I have seen a man do this on TV. He got a girl's name and talked to her on chat. I would not do that. But some people in my class do this. They know me by my screen name. They can see my schedule and where I am. I try to keep my information safe. But I use Facebook to talk to friends. So it is hard. I only let people I know look at my profile. I do not know if this is private or not. I heard my roommate's high school banned students from having Myspace. I think this is unfair. The school should not tell students what they can and can't do.

I talk about Iraq War.
I feel bad.
I don't like to say this.
I was against it from start.
It's not important now.
Many think it was bad idea.
Nearly everyone thinks so.
Poll say eighty percent.
Seventy-five percent of world.
Iraqis think us leave.
Troops say us leave in year.
War is disaster.
Pulling out is also disaster.
Middle East hard to understand.
Culture different.
Democracy not work there.
Iraq was bad.
But, should consider pros and cons.
We go into quicksand.
I don't know what to say.
I don't see reason to stay.
I don't agree with administration.
No good reason to stay.
I see people leave in year.
People we help want us to leave.
We should ask them.
If they say yes, not our fault.
If bad happens, we ask them.
We can help later.
We'll be good guys.
We never good guys in Middle East.
But better than now.

I agree. Gender discrimination still exists in the United States.

For women, it's hard to reach the top. Many people don't want to work under a woman. This is because society has long thought that women are not good for high positions.

Men also face issues. In fashion, people think that men don't know about fashion for women.

We can't change this quickly. It takes time. We're making progress. More women are becoming CEOs. More men are staying at home as fathers.

Society is learning to accept these changes. We should promote good qualities of people. If we push too hard, people will resist. We need to change slowly.

Class and where you grew up also matter. People might judge you if you don't speak well. They might not trust you.

Yes, it's more discrimination against those not born in cities or with good education.

They did not legalize it. They decriminalized it. This means it is not a criminal offense. It's like a traffic ticket. If you get caught, you just get cited. It is not like a drug charge. Decriminalization does not stop future problems. It can cost a lot to arrest and lock up people. It costs a lot for trials and lawyers. This can be a problem for towns with money problems. Some towns do not want to decriminalize. In Denver, it is okay. They save money and can help more people. Marijuana should not be everywhere. It is not like cigarettes. It can be taboo. People react differently to substances. Some people can handle more than others. Both alcohol and marijuana have bad effects.

I say yes.
Many things in the Catholic Church are old.
It is good to keep traditions.
But we must also be able to change.
Many Catholics must go to Church every week.
They are strict about how things are done.
Sometimes, they make others feel bad if they do not follow all rules.
They do not accept people who are not perfect Catholics or other religions.
My parents were not both Catholic.
My dad was Episcopalian.
My mom was Catholic.
They would not marry them in the Catholic Church.
This is not kind to others.
The Church teaches to love others, but does not accept them if they are not perfect.
This is not fair.
The Church's rules are old and not kind.
People who hurt children will do it no matter if married or not.
I do not think allowing priests to marry would stop this.

I don't know yet about marriage.
It is very difficult.
Church and state should not mix.
Marriage is hard to define without hurting feelings.
I think same-sex marriage should be like civil unions.
It's about two people together.
Government should not care about religion.
It should just look at it as a civil union.
States should agree and make it a law.
But, a constitutional amendment to ban it is silly.
It's not a big enough issue.
It's not important enough to change the constitution.

I grew up in a Christian family. I am confused about homosexuality. I have many gay friends. I do not agree with their lifestyle, but I think it should be legal. I do not think it should be a national issue. I think each state should decide. Some states are democratic and some are republican. Democratic states will be for gay marriage. If you live in a democratic state, you know how it feels about the issue. You chose to live there. I think homosexuals should have the same opportunities as heterosexuals. Therefore, I think it should be legal based on each state's decision. I do not think the president should decide for the whole country. I do not agree with Bush's ban on it. He does not live in every state, so he should not make decisions for each state. I think some things should be left to each state. It is their decision, not the president's. I do not think it should go back and forth. Each state should make their own decision. They will live with it, not the president.

I don’t agree.
Myspace is public.
You post. Others see.
School officials can see too.
They help keep school safe.
They check for bad things.
This is good.
I don’t think they should look just to catch students.
But, if they help make school safer, yes.
When parents drop kids off, they expect safety.
Schools have drills for safety.
School officials were just making school safer.
They prevent bad things like school shootings.
I agree with that.

At first, I thought we should go to war. I felt angry about 9/11. I wanted to bring big damage to them. But now, I think this was a mistake. We rushed into war without a good plan. We did not think about the long-term effects. We just went there to get revenge. President Bush thought the people wanted to go to war. He decided to declare war on Iraq. But we should have had a better plan. We did not know what to do. We did not have unity. We should have made a better plan before going to war. I think we cannot change them. They will always fight each other. We cannot stay there forever. We should leave. We are not helping by staying there.

I like. I think it's okay for gay people to marry. I don't think it's a choice. It's like being born straight. Some people are born gay. It's not something they choose. The war in Iraq was not right.
The U.S. government was not honest about the reasons for war. They said Iraq was linked to the 9/11 attacks, but it was not true. They wanted to make people believe Iraq was the cause. The war started in 2003.

I hope the war ends soon, but it probably will not.

transformed_texts: The Catholic Church should change in some ways. Many people do not like their beliefs. The Church is not accepting of some things. For example, they do not accept gay marriage, abortion, and birth control. Their views are old-fashioned. If they changed, they might not lose followers. Some people do not agree with the Church's views. They feel the Church has wrong views. For example, the Church is against abortion. If a person wants this, they might not want to follow the Church. The same is true for gay marriage. The Church thinks priests should not be married. But I think this is OK. Other jobs let people have family life. I do not see why priests cannot have both.

I am not against same-sex marriage. People cannot choose their sexual orientation. It is not a choice. Therefore, it is wrong to say that only men and women can marry. The federal government should not be involved in this matter. It is not a legal or moral issue. Gay people should not be blamed for being who they are. They should not be punished for it. It is their natural way. The government should not interfere.

I believe gay marriage should be legal. There are no good reasons to stop it. Many people think gay couples harm the traditional family. But, this is not true. Homosexual couples are different. They have the same rights as heterosexual couples. They should not be treated differently. Many studies show gay couples are successful and happy. They should be allowed to marry. This is not about religion. It is about being allowed to marry legally. It is not fair to have different rules for gay couples. This is like segregation. Gay couples should have the same rights as everyone else. The government should allow gay marriage everywhere. President Bush has strong views about gay marriage. He feels it is like abortion and stem cell research. This is personal and not based on facts. Most reasons against gay marriage are moral. But, morality differs. The government should not use certain religious beliefs to make laws. Many people think gay people are damaged. But, studies show this is not true. People should listen to experts, not just friends and neighbors.

I work in a hospital pharmacy during the summer. Some drugs are illegal but have good uses. I think we should allow them for medicinal purposes. For example, oxycotton, Vicodin, and Percocets are illegal but helpful. Many people think marijuana is bad because it is illegal. However, it is not as bad as other drugs. I believe we should change the image of marijuana. This could help people use it safely, especially for medical reasons.

The church has changed. It is not as strict as it used to be. When I was young, I always wore cute dresses to church every Sunday. I went to private school and saw my friends there. Now, there is a special service for teenagers. It is only thirty minutes. People wear casual clothes. Some even come in beach clothes. Families come late. Even in morning service, people wear jeans and khakis. I think this is a good change. As for other things, the biggest change is the way the church has become more casual. I do not know the politics of the church. That's all.

Regarding the accusations against Catholic priests, I do not think these could have been prevented by allowing female priests or priests to marry. Some men who are married still become pedophiles. They are attracted to young kids. This is not because they are allowed or not allowed to marry. It is a personal choice to become a priest. Some religions allow married ministers. If a priest wants to marry and practice their faith, they should consider another religion. I think pedophilia is based on genetics. It is not something people become. I do not think the church could have prevented this. If they knew and tried to cover it up, they should be ashamed. But I do not think they always knew. I have no other thoughts about the Catholic Church.

I was okay with the start, but I don't think everyone was ready for it. We went to Iraq because of the September 11th attack. The Bush administration said Saddam Hussein had weapons of mass destruction. This was not true. This made me angry. I think they lied to the American people. Colin Powell, who spoke at the UN, now says he didn't believe the evidence. This is bad. They should be held accountable. They have not followed the constitution. I think they went to war on purpose. The Bush administration wanted to take revenge on Saddam Hussein. They also wanted more energy. I think it has lasted too long. If we leave now, it might cause a civil war. The UN and the US want other countries to help. But this might cause more problems. The government in Iraq is not strong. The Parliament is not working well. The Prime Minister has no control. Radical groups are fighting for power. It is a difficult situation.

I think. The Iraq War is not fair. It is not a declared war. It is like we are getting back at Iraq for the terrorist attacks on September 11. I do not follow the war much. I know we are there to build democracy. We also want oil. It is not a good idea to stay. We are just making people angry. If we leave, they will be angry. They have to rebuild all by themselves. It is very hard to decide. I think we should stop the war. It is not a real war. We should not use guns to show we are big. We should help them. We are wasting our resources. Bush looks bad. He started a meaningless war. It is hard to say if I want the war to end. Many families have sons and daughters in Iraq. We should help them. But they have different cultures. If we stay, we will make things worse. Al-Qaeda will grow more. They will hate us more. It will take many years for this to end. That's all.

I think it is not right to make it legal or for a state to declare it legal. The constitution says there should be a separation of church and state. It is clear and written in stone. I believe it is up to the churches to decide what is legal or illegal. The government should not decide this. The president is trying to make an amendment to ban it, but this is just his personal view as a Catholic. It is not fair to choose one religion over another. I do not believe the amendment will help the economy or society. I have said all I need to say.

The war in Iraq
The government did not tell the truth about the war
They said Iraq was linked to the 2001 attacks
But it was not true
The government used people's anger about the attacks to start the war
I did not support the war
I especially did not support a surprise attack
The war is like the Vietnam War
Many American soldiers died
The government did not plan for what would happen after removing Iraq's government
They tried to make a new government like in Vietnam
But it was difficult
Many people in Iraq did not want the US there
The war is still going on
Many American soldiers are dying
The government should have planned better
They said the war would be short and easy
But it is taking a long time
I did not vote for George Bush in 2004
But I would have voted to let him finish the war
It is hard to leave after taking away someone's government
We should see the war to the end
But the cost is too high
The war is about oil
The US is not attacking other countries with weapons of mass destruction
The government is not being honest
We hope for peace, but it might not happen soon

I like gay marriage. I have since I was a kid. It is a personal choice. It is not something people can control. I think it is unfair to take away rights from people who cannot control this. I think it is cruel. I always support gay marriage. I do not think government should interfere. It is a personal choice, not a government decision. Many people in my neighborhood are gay. They live like any other family. They walk dogs on the street. People like Bush should not try to change marriage definition. It is ridiculous. I believe many scientists say being gay is biological, not just social. I think marriage should be private, not public. I do not think government should control it.

Internet is public. Once you put something online, everyone can see it. As an R.A., I have dealt with this. If you say something serious like about blowing things up or shootings, someone might get worried. You cannot control what other people think or believe. If the school gets a report, they must act to protect students. Sometimes, people might joke about dangerous things. Once the school gets such information, they must look at it carefully. They should not use fake names to look at students' online accounts. If a report is serious, they must act. However, they should not spy on students' personal messages. If reports are true, they must take them seriously. I would not friend my residents on social media. I don’t want to know their personal life. It’s not my job to supervise them there. I don’t think school officials should friend students on social media. But if a serious report comes to them, they must act.

I think the war has gone on too long, like a long game.
The start was good, to make a country free. Now, we have lost that goal.
We do not do it for the good. We do it to show we are strong.
Maybe we started for good reasons. But, now it's not clear. Maybe we have bad reasons, like old problems between the US and Iraq.
The start was good. We showed that we can start a war. But, the war has gone on for too long.

I think we started with good reasons. But, now our reasons are not good. It seems like we fight just to fight.
We do not want to stop the war. We want to win.
But, the other country must take care of itself. We have our own problems. We should spend money on our own problems.
Other countries should help themselves. We should not spend money on their problems forever. There is only so much money.
We have many problems. Like poverty and schools. We should fix our problems, not other countries' problems.

I want to ask a question to clear up something.

Someone stopped something bad from happening because they looked online and saw something.

It is not invasion of privacy.
If you put things on the internet, other people can see it.
On Myspace, only friends can see your profile.
But if you accept someone as a friend, you let them see your profile.
When you put information online, you must know many people can see it.
I think it was good that someone saw this and stopped something bad.
But it is hard to have one person check everyone's profiles at school.
It could be unfair to look only at bad kids.
But if they find something bad, it is okay to look.
I do not use Myspace, but I use Facebook.
I worry about strange people seeing my things.
I saw on TV a man who got a girl's screen name in one minute.
He talked to her and made her meet him.
I would not meet someone I do not know.
But some people in my classes know me by my screen name.
They know my interests, where I am, and my friends.
I try to put only safe things on Facebook.
But I want to stay connected with friends.
It is hard to decide what to put up.
I only accept people I know.
But I do not know who can see what.

My roommate told me her school banned students from having Myspace.
I do not think school officials can tell students they cannot have Myspace.
It seems like a privacy issue.
I do not know how they can do this.

The Iraq War is a big topic to discuss.
I feel bad talking about it.
Many people think it was a mistake from the start.
The government did not want to admit they were wrong.
Now, many people in the U.S. and Iraq think it was a bad idea.
Most Iraqis and U.S. troops there think we should leave within a year.
It has been a disaster since we entered.
I am not sure what to think.
The Middle East is very different from the U.S.
We cannot impose our ideas on them.
Saddam was bad, but we should weigh the risks before invading.
It is like quicksand.
I do not see a reason to stay.
The administration has no good reasons to stay.
I would be fine with leaving slowly over a year.
But, I think we should leave now.
Most Iraqis want us to leave within a year.
They know better than we do about their situation.
If they want us to leave, we should respect that.
After we leave, we can still help if needed.
I do not think we will be seen as the good guys in the Middle East.
But, it will be better than staying where we are now.

Yes, gender discrimination still exists in the United States. It happens in different ways in different fields. Women have trouble getting promoted because people think women should not be in high positions. Men also have trouble. For example, men who stay home to take care of children are not accepted by society. People think men should work. In the fashion industry, men are not taken seriously. People think men do not understand fashion. In all fields, people from certain backgrounds face discrimination. For example, people from farms might not be accepted if they have bad grammar. This is also true for gender discrimination. People need to work slowly to change these things. They must show the good qualities of people who are discriminated against. People will resist if changes happen too fast.

I understand they did not make it legal. They changed it to a smaller offense, like a traffic ticket. This means people caught do not go to jail. This can happen in job interviews or other important situations. Some people worry about these effects on their future. But, it can save money for cities. They do not need to arrest people, take them to court, or pay for lawyers. This money can go to schools, social programs, or helping homeless people. Denver is more open to this. They have more money for these things now. Marijuana should not be everywhere. It is not like cigarettes. It is still not acceptable in many places. People react differently to drugs. Some people can use them safely, while others cannot. Both drugs have negative effects.

I like the Catholic Church.
Many things they do are traditional.
This is good.
But, change is also important.
Some Catholics go to church every week.
They follow rules strictly.
They do not accept others who don’t follow the rules.
My mom was Episcopalian.
My dad was Episcopalian.
They would not marry my parents in the Catholic Church.
This is not kind to other religions.
We learned to love others. But, the Church does not accept other religions.
Some Catholic teachings say to love others, but the Church does not accept others.
This is hypocritical.
Some Catholic rules are old.
But, the Church continues to follow them.
I think it would be good to let priests marry.
But, this might not stop bad behavior.
Bad behavior is not stopped by marriage.
I think it would happen anyway.

I am not sure yet about this topic. I can't say if one side is right or wrong. This is a hard problem. It is about church and state, and how to define marriage. It is hard to talk about without hurting people's feelings. I don't know if marriage should be defined by the government. I think it's better to just call it a civil union. It's what it is: two people. The government shouldn't look at what kind of marriage it is. If all states agree, they should make it a law. But a law to ban gay marriage is silly. It's not important enough to change the constitution. No.

I was raised in a Christian family. Homosexuality is not easy for me to understand. I have many gay friends. I do not agree with their lifestyle. However, I think it should be legal. I do not think it should be a national issue. Each state should decide on their own. Many states are democratic. Many are republican. Democratic states will support gay marriage. I cannot disagree with a state's decision if I live there. I chose to live there. I think homosexuals should have the same opportunities as heterosexuals. Therefore, it should be legal based on each state's choice. I do not think Bush should decide for the whole country. It is not fair. He should not decide how each state runs itself. He will be out of office soon. A new president might change it. It should be up to each state. They will live with the decision, not the president.

Myspace is public.
People can see posts.
School officials can see them too.
It's okay if they look for safety.
If they find unsafe things, it's fine.
It's like checking for drugs or bad things.
It's not invasion of privacy if it saves lives.
It's a public space.
You should not post bad things.
They might find them later.
It's like a game of tag.
It's always there.
School officials should not just look for students.
But if they find bad things, they should act.
Parents trust the school for safety.
They do drills and practice.
For safety, they check for bad things.
This is what the officials did.
They make the school safer.

I was upset by ten eleven. I wanted to go to war. I thought we should do more harm. I now think this was wrong. We did not plan well. We did not think long term. I think it was bad for us. I do not care about what happens there. I think we should leave. We did not have a good plan. We were just angry and wanted revenge. Bush wanted to go to war. We could not let them do bad things. But we should have planned better. We should have known what to do. I do not think we changed them. They will always fight. We are not helping them. We might make it worse. It is not worth staying. We should leave.

transformed_texts: The Catholic Church should change in some ways. Many people do not like their beliefs. The Church is not accepting of some things. For example, they do not accept gay marriage, abortion, and birth control. Their views are old-fashioned. If they changed, they might not lose followers. Some people do not agree with the Church's views. They feel the Church has wrong views. For example, the Church is against abortion. If a person wants this, they might not want to follow the Church. The same is true for gay marriage. The Church thinks priests should not be married. But I think this is OK. Other jobs let people have family life. I do not see why priests cannot have both.

I am not against same-sex marriage. People cannot choose their sexual orientation. It is not a choice. Therefore, it is wrong to say that only men and women can marry. The federal government should not be involved in this matter. It is not a legal or moral issue. Gay people should not be blamed for being who they are. They should not be punished for it. It is their natural way. The government should not interfere.

I believe gay marriage should be legal. There are no good reasons to stop it. Many people think gay couples harm the traditional family. But, this is not true. Homosexual couples are different. They have the same rights as heterosexual couples. They should not be treated differently. Many studies show gay couples are successful and happy. They should be allowed to marry. This is not about religion. It is about being allowed to marry legally. It is not fair to have different rules for gay couples. This is like segregation. Gay couples should have the same rights as everyone else. The government should allow gay marriage everywhere. President Bush has strong views about gay marriage. He feels it is like abortion and stem cell research. This is personal and not based on facts. Most reasons against gay marriage are moral. But, morality differs. The government should not use certain religious beliefs to make laws. Many people think gay people are damaged. But, studies show this is not true. People should listen to experts, not just friends and neighbors.

I work in a hospital pharmacy during the summer. Some drugs are illegal but have good uses. I think we should allow them for medicinal purposes. For example, oxycotton, Vicodin, and Percocets are illegal but helpful. Many people think marijuana is bad because it is illegal. However, it is not as bad as other drugs. I believe we should change the image of marijuana. This could help people use it safely, especially for medical reasons.

The church has changed. It is not as strict as it used to be. When I was young, I always wore cute dresses to church every Sunday. I went to private school and saw my friends there. Now, there is a special service for teenagers. It is only thirty minutes. People wear casual clothes. Some even come in beach clothes. Families come late. Even in morning service, people wear jeans and khakis. I think this is a good change. As for other things, the biggest change is the way the church has become more casual. I do not know the politics of the church. That's all.

Regarding the accusations against Catholic priests, I do not think these could have been prevented by allowing female priests or priests to marry. Some men who are married still become pedophiles. They are attracted to young kids. This is not because they are allowed or not allowed to marry. It is a personal choice to become a priest. Some religions allow married ministers. If a priest wants to marry and practice their faith, they should consider another religion. I think pedophilia is based on genetics. It is not something people become. I do not think the church could have prevented this. If they knew and tried to cover it up, they should be ashamed. But I do not think they always knew. I have no other thoughts about the Catholic Church.

I was okay with the start, but I don't think everyone was ready for it. We went to Iraq because of the September 11th attack. The Bush administration said Saddam Hussein had weapons of mass destruction. This was not true. This made me angry. I think they lied to the American people. Colin Powell, who spoke at the UN, now says he didn't believe the evidence. This is bad. They should be held accountable. They have not followed the constitution. I think they went to war on purpose. The Bush administration wanted to take revenge on Saddam Hussein. They also wanted more energy. I think it has lasted too long. If we leave now, it might cause a civil war. The UN and the US want other countries to help. But this might cause more problems. The government in Iraq is not strong. The Parliament is not working well. The Prime Minister has no control. Radical groups are fighting for power. It is a difficult situation.

I think. The Iraq War is not fair. It is not a declared war. It is like we are getting back at Iraq for the terrorist attacks on September 11. I do not follow the war much. I know we are there to build democracy. We also want oil. It is not a good idea to stay. We are just making people angry. If we leave, they will be angry. They have to rebuild all by themselves. It is very hard to decide. I think we should stop the war. It is not a real war. We should not use guns to show we are big. We should help them. We are wasting our resources. Bush looks bad. He started a meaningless war. It is hard to say if I want the war to end. Many families have sons and daughters in Iraq. We should help them. But they have different cultures. If we stay, we will make things worse. Al-Qaeda will grow more. They will hate us more. It will take many years for this to end. That's all.

I think it is not right to make it legal or for a state to declare it legal. The constitution says there should be a separation of church and state. It is clear and written in stone. I believe it is up to the churches to decide what is legal or illegal. The government should not decide this. The president is trying to make an amendment to ban it, but this is just his personal view as a Catholic. It is not fair to choose one religion over another. I do not believe the amendment will help the economy or society. I have said all I need to say.

The war in Iraq
The government did not tell the truth about the war
They said Iraq was linked to the 2001 attacks
But it was not true
The government used people's anger about the attacks to start the war
I did not support the war
I especially did not support a surprise attack
The war is like the Vietnam War
Many American soldiers died
The government did not plan for what would happen after removing Iraq's government
They tried to make a new government like in Vietnam
But it was difficult
Many people in Iraq did not want the US there
The war is still going on
Many American soldiers are dying
The government should have planned better
They said the war would be short and easy
But it is taking a long time
I did not vote for George Bush in 2004
But I would have voted to let him finish the war
It is hard to leave after taking away someone's government
We should see the war to the end
But the cost is too high
The war is about oil
The US is not attacking other countries with weapons of mass destruction
The government is not being honest
We hope for peace, but it might not happen soon

I like gay marriage. I have since I was a kid. It is a personal choice. It is not something people can control. I think it is unfair to take away rights from people who cannot control this. I think it is cruel. I always support gay marriage. I do not think government should interfere. It is a personal choice, not a government decision. Many people in my neighborhood are gay. They live like any other family. They walk dogs on the street. People like Bush should not try to change marriage definition. It is ridiculous. I believe many scientists say being gay is biological, not just social. I think marriage should be private, not public. I do not think government should control it.

Internet is public. Once you put something online, everyone can see it. As an R.A., I have dealt with this. If you say something serious like about blowing things up or shootings, someone might get worried. You cannot control what other people think or believe. If the school gets a report, they must act to protect students. Sometimes, people might joke about dangerous things. Once the school gets such information, they must look at it carefully. They should not use fake names to look at students' online accounts. If a report is serious, they must act. However, they should not spy on students' personal messages. If reports are true, they must take them seriously. I would not friend my residents on social media. I don’t want to know their personal life. It’s not my job to supervise them there. I don’t think school officials should friend students on social media. But if a serious report comes to them, they must act.

I think the war has gone on too long, like a long game.
The start was good, to make a country free. Now, we have lost that goal.
We do not do it for the good. We do it to show we are strong.
Maybe we started for good reasons. But, now it's not clear. Maybe we have bad reasons, like old problems between the US and Iraq.
The start was good. We showed that we can start a war. But, the war has gone on for too long.

I think we started with good reasons. But, now our reasons are not good. It seems like we fight just to fight.
We do not want to stop the war. We want to win.
But, the other country must take care of itself. We have our own problems. We should spend money on our own problems.
Other countries should help themselves. We should not spend money on their problems forever. There is only so much money.
We have many problems. Like poverty and schools. We should fix our problems, not other countries' problems.

I want to ask a question to clear up something.

Someone stopped something bad from happening because they looked online and saw something.

It is not invasion of privacy.
If you put things on the internet, other people can see it.
On Myspace, only friends can see your profile.
But if you accept someone as a friend, you let them see your profile.
When you put information online, you must know many people can see it.
I think it was good that someone saw this and stopped something bad.
But it is hard to have one person check everyone's profiles at school.
It could be unfair to look only at bad kids.
But if they find something bad, it is okay to look.
I do not use Myspace, but I use Facebook.
I worry about strange people seeing my things.
I saw on TV a man who got a girl's screen name in one minute.
He talked to her and made her meet him.
I would not meet someone I do not know.
But some people in my classes know me by my screen name.
They know my interests, where I am, and my friends.
I try to put only safe things on Facebook.
But I want to stay connected with friends.
It is hard to decide what to put up.
I only accept people I know.
But I do not know who can see what.

My roommate told me her school banned students from having Myspace.
I do not think school officials can tell students they cannot have Myspace.
It seems like a privacy issue.
I do not know how they can do this.

The Iraq War is a big topic to discuss.
I feel bad talking about it.
Many people think it was a mistake from the start.
The government did not want to admit they were wrong.
Now, many people in the U.S. and Iraq think it was a bad idea.
Most Iraqis and U.S. troops there think we should leave within a year.
It has been a disaster since we entered.
I am not sure what to think.
The Middle East is very different from the U.S.
We cannot impose our ideas on them.
Saddam was bad, but we should weigh the risks before invading.
It is like quicksand.
I do not see a reason to stay.
The administration has no good reasons to stay.
I would be fine with leaving slowly over a year.
But, I think we should leave now.
Most Iraqis want us to leave within a year.
They know better than we do about their situation.
If they want us to leave, we should respect that.
After we leave, we can still help if needed.
I do not think we will be seen as the good guys in the Middle East.
But, it will be better than staying where we are now.

Yes, gender discrimination still exists in the United States. It happens in different ways in different fields. Women have trouble getting promoted because people think women should not be in high positions. Men also have trouble. For example, men who stay home to take care of children are not accepted by society. People think men should work. In the fashion industry, men are not taken seriously. People think men do not understand fashion. In all fields, people from certain backgrounds face discrimination. For example, people from farms might not be accepted if they have bad grammar. This is also true for gender discrimination. People need to work slowly to change these things. They must show the good qualities of people who are discriminated against. People will resist if changes happen too fast.

I understand they did not make it legal. They changed it to a smaller offense, like a traffic ticket. This means people caught do not go to jail. This can happen in job interviews or other important situations. Some people worry about these effects on their future. But, it can save money for cities. They do not need to arrest people, take them to court, or pay for lawyers. This money can go to schools, social programs, or helping homeless people. Denver is more open to this. They have more money for these things now. Marijuana should not be everywhere. It is not like cigarettes. It is still not acceptable in many places. People react differently to drugs. Some people can use them safely, while others cannot. Both drugs have negative effects.

I like the Catholic Church.
Many things they do are traditional.
This is good.
But, change is also important.
Some Catholics go to church every week.
They follow rules strictly.
They do not accept others who don’t follow the rules.
My mom was Episcopalian.
My dad was Episcopalian.
They would not marry my parents in the Catholic Church.
This is not kind to other religions.
We learned to love others. But, the Church does not accept other religions.
Some Catholic teachings say to love others, but the Church does not accept others.
This is hypocritical.
Some Catholic rules are old.
But, the Church continues to follow them.
I think it would be good to let priests marry.
But, this might not stop bad behavior.
Bad behavior is not stopped by marriage.
I think it would happen anyway.

I am not sure yet about this topic. I can't say if one side is right or wrong. This is a hard problem. It is about church and state, and how to define marriage. It is hard to talk about without hurting people's feelings. I don't know if marriage should be defined by the government. I think it's better to just call it a civil union. It's what it is: two people. The government shouldn't look at what kind of marriage it is. If all states agree, they should make it a law. But a law to ban gay marriage is silly. It's not important enough to change the constitution. No.

I was raised in a Christian family. Homosexuality is not easy for me to understand. I have many gay friends. I do not agree with their lifestyle. However, I think it should be legal. I do not think it should be a national issue. Each state should decide on their own. Many states are democratic. Many are republican. Democratic states will support gay marriage. I cannot disagree with a state's decision if I live there. I chose to live there. I think homosexuals should have the same opportunities as heterosexuals. Therefore, it should be legal based on each state's choice. I do not think Bush should decide for the whole country. It is not fair. He should not decide how each state runs itself. He will be out of office soon. A new president might change it. It should be up to each state. They will live with the decision, not the president.

Myspace is public.
People can see posts.
School officials can see them too.
It's okay if they look for safety.
If they find unsafe things, it's fine.
It's like checking for drugs or bad things.
It's not invasion of privacy if it saves lives.
It's a public space.
You should not post bad things.
They might find them later.
It's like a game of tag.
It's always there.
School officials should not just look for students.
But if they find bad things, they should act.
Parents trust the school for safety.
They do drills and practice.
For safety, they check for bad things.
This is what the officials did.
They make the school safer.

I was upset by ten eleven. I wanted to go to war. I thought we should do more harm. I now think this was wrong. We did not plan well. We did not think long term. I think it was bad for us. I do not care about what happens there. I think we should leave. We did not have a good plan. We were just angry and wanted revenge. Bush wanted to go to war. We could not let them do bad things. But we should have planned better. We should have known what to do. I do not think we changed them. They will always fight. We are not helping them. We might make it worse. It is not worth staying. We should leave.

transformed_texts: The Catholic Church should change in some ways. Many people do not like their beliefs. The Church is not accepting of some things. For example, they do not accept gay marriage, abortion, and birth control. Their views are old-fashioned. If they changed, they might not lose followers. Some people do not agree with the Church's views. They feel the Church has wrong views. For example, the Church is against abortion. If a person wants this, they might not want to follow the Church. The same is true for gay marriage. The Church thinks priests should not be married. But I think this is OK. Other jobs let people have family life. I do not see why priests cannot have both.

I am not against same-sex marriage. People cannot choose their sexual orientation. It is not a choice. Therefore, it is wrong to say that only men and women can marry. The federal government should not be involved in this matter. It is not a legal or moral issue. Gay people should not be blamed for being who they are. They should not be punished for it. It is their natural way. The government should not interfere.

I believe gay marriage should be legal. There are no good reasons to stop it. Many people think gay couples harm the traditional family. But, this is not true. Homosexual couples are different. They have the same rights as heterosexual couples. They should not be treated differently. Many studies show gay couples are successful and happy. They should be allowed to marry. This is not about religion. It is about being allowed to marry legally. It is not fair to have different rules for gay couples. This is like segregation. Gay couples should have the same rights as everyone else. The government should allow gay marriage everywhere. President Bush has strong views about gay marriage. He feels it is like abortion and stem cell research. This is personal and not based on facts. Most reasons against gay marriage are moral. But, morality differs. The government should not use certain religious beliefs to make laws. Many people think gay people are damaged. But, studies show this is not true. People should listen to experts, not just friends and neighbors.

I work in a hospital pharmacy during the summer. Some drugs are illegal but have good uses. I think we should allow them for medicinal purposes. For example, oxycotton, Vicodin, and Percocets are illegal but helpful. Many people think marijuana is bad because it is illegal. However, it is not as bad as other drugs. I believe we should change the image of marijuana. This could help people use it safely, especially for medical reasons.

The church has changed. It is not as strict as it used to be. When I was young, I always wore cute dresses to church every Sunday. I went to private school and saw my friends there. Now, there is a special service for teenagers. It is only thirty minutes. People wear casual clothes. Some even come in beach clothes. Families come late. Even in morning service, people wear jeans and khakis. I think this is a good change. As for other things, the biggest change is the way the church has become more casual. I do not know the politics of the church. That's all.

Regarding the accusations against Catholic priests, I do not think these could have been prevented by allowing female priests or priests to marry. Some men who are married still become pedophiles. They are attracted to young kids. This is not because they are allowed or not allowed to marry. It is a personal choice to become a priest. Some religions allow married ministers. If a priest wants to marry and practice their faith, they should consider another religion. I think pedophilia is based on genetics. It is not something people become. I do not think the church could have prevented this. If they knew and tried to cover it up, they should be ashamed. But I do not think they always knew. I have no other thoughts about the Catholic Church.

I was okay with the start, but I don't think everyone was ready for it. We went to Iraq because of the September 11th attack. The Bush administration said Saddam Hussein had weapons of mass destruction. This was not true. This made me angry. I think they lied to the American people. Colin Powell, who spoke at the UN, now says he didn't believe the evidence. This is bad. They should be held accountable. They have not followed the constitution. I think they went to war on purpose. The Bush administration wanted to take revenge on Saddam Hussein. They also wanted more energy. I think it has lasted too long. If we leave now, it might cause a civil war. The UN and the US want other countries to help. But this might cause more problems. The government in Iraq is not strong. The Parliament is not working well. The Prime Minister has no control. Radical groups are fighting for power. It is a difficult situation.

I think. The Iraq War is not fair. It is not a declared war. It is like we are getting back at Iraq for the terrorist attacks on September 11. I do not follow the war much. I know we are there to build democracy. We also want oil. It is not a good idea to stay. We are just making people angry. If we leave, they will be angry. They have to rebuild all by themselves. It is very hard to decide. I think we should stop the war. It is not a real war. We should not use guns to show we are big. We should help them. We are wasting our resources. Bush looks bad. He started a meaningless war. It is hard to say if I want the war to end. Many families have sons and daughters in Iraq. We should help them. But they have different cultures. If we stay, we will make things worse. Al-Qaeda will grow more. They will hate us more. It will take many years for this to end. That's all.

I think it is not right to make it legal or for a state to declare it legal. The constitution says there should be a separation of church and state. It is clear and written in stone. I believe it is up to the churches to decide what is legal or illegal. The government should not decide this. The president is trying to make an amendment to ban it, but this is just his personal view as a Catholic. It is not fair to choose one religion over another. I do not believe the amendment will help the economy or society. I have said all I need to say.

The war in Iraq
The government did not tell the truth about the war
They said Iraq was linked to the 2001 attacks
But it was not true
The government used people's anger about the attacks to start the war
I did not support the war
I especially did not support a surprise attack
The war is like the Vietnam War
Many American soldiers died
The government did not plan for what would happen after removing Iraq's government
They tried to make a new government like in Vietnam
But it was difficult
Many people in Iraq did not want the US there
The war is still going on
Many American soldiers are dying
The government should have planned better
They said the war would be short and easy
But it is taking a long time
I did not vote for George Bush in 2004
But I would have voted to let him finish the war
It is hard to leave after taking away someone's government
We should see the war to the end
But the cost is too high
The war is about oil
The US is not attacking other countries with weapons of mass destruction
The government is not being honest
We hope for peace, but it might not happen soon

I like gay marriage. I have since I was a kid. It is a personal choice. It is not something people can control. I think it is unfair to take away rights from people who cannot control this. I think it is cruel. I always support gay marriage. I do not think government should interfere. It is a personal choice, not a government decision. Many people in my neighborhood are gay. They live like any other family. They walk dogs on the street. People like Bush should not try to change marriage definition. It is ridiculous. I believe many scientists say being gay is biological, not just social. I think marriage should be private, not public. I do not think government should control it.

Internet is public. Once you put something online, everyone can see it. As an R.A., I have dealt with this. If you say something serious like about blowing things up or shootings, someone might get worried. You cannot control what other people think or believe. If the school gets a report, they must act to protect students. Sometimes, people might joke about dangerous things. Once the school gets such information, they must look at it carefully. They should not use fake names to look at students' online accounts. If a report is serious, they must act. However, they should not spy on students' personal messages. If reports are true, they must take them seriously. I would not friend my residents on social media. I don’t want to know their personal life. It’s not my job to supervise them there. I don’t think school officials should friend students on social media. But if a serious report comes to them, they must act.

I think the war has gone on too long, like a long game.
The start was good, to make a country free. Now, we have lost that goal.
We do not do it for the good. We do it to show we are strong.
Maybe we started for good reasons. But, now it's not clear. Maybe we have bad reasons, like old problems between the US and Iraq.
The start was good. We showed that we can start a war. But, the war has gone on for too long.

I think we started with good reasons. But, now our reasons are not good. It seems like we fight just to fight.
We do not want to stop the war. We want to win.
But, the other country must take care of itself. We have our own problems. We should spend money on our own problems.
Other countries should help themselves. We should not spend money on their problems forever. There is only so much money.
We have many problems. Like poverty and schools. We should fix our problems, not other countries' problems.

I want to ask a question to clear up something.

Someone stopped something bad from happening because they looked online and saw something.

It is not invasion of privacy.
If you put things on the internet, other people can see it.
On Myspace, only friends can see your profile.
But if you accept someone as a friend, you let them see your profile.
When you put information online, you must know many people can see it.
I think it was good that someone saw this and stopped something bad.
But it is hard to have one person check everyone's profiles at school.
It could be unfair to look only at bad kids.
But if they find something bad, it is okay to look.
I do not use Myspace, but I use Facebook.
I worry about strange people seeing my things.
I saw on TV a man who got a girl's screen name in one minute.
He talked to her and made her meet him.
I would not meet someone I do not know.
But some people in my classes know me by my screen name.
They know my interests, where I am, and my friends.
I try to put only safe things on Facebook.
But I want to stay connected with friends.
It is hard to decide what to put up.
I only accept people I know.
But I do not know who can see what.

My roommate told me her school banned students from having Myspace.
I do not think school officials can tell students they cannot have Myspace.
It seems like a privacy issue.
I do not know how they can do this.

The Iraq War is a big topic to discuss.
I feel bad talking about it.
Many people think it was a mistake from the start.
The government did not want to admit they were wrong.
Now, many people in the U.S. and Iraq think it was a bad idea.
Most Iraqis and U.S. troops there think we should leave within a year.
It has been a disaster since we entered.
I am not sure what to think.
The Middle East is very different from the U.S.
We cannot impose our ideas on them.
Saddam was bad, but we should weigh the risks before invading.
It is like quicksand.
I do not see a reason to stay.
The administration has no good reasons to stay.
I would be fine with leaving slowly over a year.
But, I think we should leave now.
Most Iraqis want us to leave within a year.
They know better than we do about their situation.
If they want us to leave, we should respect that.
After we leave, we can still help if needed.
I do not think we will be seen as the good guys in the Middle East.
But, it will be better than staying where we are now.

Yes, gender discrimination still exists in the United States. It happens in different ways in different fields. Women have trouble getting promoted because people think women should not be in high positions. Men also have trouble. For example, men who stay home to take care of children are not accepted by society. People think men should work. In the fashion industry, men are not taken seriously. People think men do not understand fashion. In all fields, people from certain backgrounds face discrimination. For example, people from farms might not be accepted if they have bad grammar. This is also true for gender discrimination. People need to work slowly to change these things. They must show the good qualities of people who are discriminated against. People will resist if changes happen too fast.

I understand they did not make it legal. They changed it to a smaller offense, like a traffic ticket. This means people caught do not go to jail. This can happen in job interviews or other important situations. Some people worry about these effects on their future. But, it can save money for cities. They do not need to arrest people, take them to court, or pay for lawyers. This money can go to schools, social programs, or helping homeless people. Denver is more open to this. They have more money for these things now. Marijuana should not be everywhere. It is not like cigarettes. It is still not acceptable in many places. People react differently to drugs. Some people can use them safely, while others cannot. Both drugs have negative effects.

I like the Catholic Church.
Many things they do are traditional.
This is good.
But, change is also important.
Some Catholics go to church every week.
They follow rules strictly.
They do not accept others who don’t follow the rules.
My mom was Episcopalian.
My dad was Episcopalian.
They would not marry my parents in the Catholic Church.
This is not kind to other religions.
We learned to love others. But, the Church does not accept other religions.
Some Catholic teachings say to love others, but the Church does not accept others.
This is hypocritical.
Some Catholic rules are old.
But, the Church continues to follow them.
I think it would be good to let priests marry.
But, this might not stop bad behavior.
Bad behavior is not stopped by marriage.
I think it would happen anyway.

I am not sure yet about this topic. I can't say if one side is right or wrong. This is a hard problem. It is about church and state, and how to define marriage. It is hard to talk about without hurting people's feelings. I don't know if marriage should be defined by the government. I think it's better to just call it a civil union. It's what it is: two people. The government shouldn't look at what kind of marriage it is. If all states agree, they should make it a law. But a law to ban gay marriage is silly. It's not important enough to change the constitution. No.

I was raised in a Christian family. Homosexuality is not easy for me to understand. I have many gay friends. I do not agree with their lifestyle. However, I think it should be legal. I do not think it should be a national issue. Each state should decide on their own. Many states are democratic. Many are republican. Democratic states will support gay marriage. I cannot disagree with a state's decision if I live there. I chose to live there. I think homosexuals should have the same opportunities as heterosexuals. Therefore, it should be legal based on each state's choice. I do not think Bush should decide for the whole country. It is not fair. He should not decide how each state runs itself. He will be out of office soon. A new president might change it. It should be up to each state. They will live with the decision, not the president.

It's okay if they look for safety.
